version_description:
New features:
- The settings page now displays your details next to the cellular and WiFi options, such as the currently set limit, total data usage, and whether or not you have set a custom background.
- Notifications are automatically cleared when Bytes is reopened
- Support for the 'Bold Text' accessibility option

Bug fixes:
- No longer displays large or negative (incorrect) numbers. If you experienced issues with large or negative numbers, please reset your settings within the app.
- No longer sends an exceed notification if you remove your limit
- Fixed a bug that previously caused crashes

- No longer displays large or negative (incorrect) numbers. If you experienced issues with large or negative numbers, please reset your settings within the app.
- No longer sends an exceed notification if you remove your limit
- Fixed a bug that previously caused crashes

- Notification Center widget: add the new Bytes widget for quick access to today's data usage
- Custom notifications: choose to be notified when you reach a certain percentage of your data limit
- Average daily limit now takes into account your previous data usage, showing you how much extra data you can use per day
- While in the app, Bytes now automatically updates the data usage values once per second
- New icon, launch images and default backgrounds (photos courtesy of Ruzaini Haron)
- Redesigned About page
- New banner ad provider
- Minor tweaks to tab bar icons
- Bug fixes
